content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: More than half of the artists do their most well-known work before age 30.
There is a positive correlation between artistsâ€™ ages and the production of their most well-known work.
The number of top artists producing their most well-known work peaks at an age in the late thirties and then gradually declines.
Artists are more likely to generate their most well-known work after the age of 65.

content.answer: The number of top artists producing their most well-known work peaks at an age in the late thirties and then gradually declines.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
